verses.text: \nd Lord\nd* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* God! How glorious \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth \w is|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* name! \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* praise reaches \w as|strong="H5921"\w* high \w as|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* heavens,

\w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* mouths \w of|strong="H3068"\w* children \w and|strong="H3068"\w* infants. \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* built \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fortress \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* enemies, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* silence \w the|strong="H3605"\w* foe \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rebel.

\w When|strong="H6310"\w* I look at \w your|strong="H5797"\w* heavens, \w the|strong="H3245"\w* \w work|strong="H3245"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w your|strong="H5797"\w* fingers, \w the|strong="H3245"\w* moon \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H3245"\w* stars, \w which|strong="H3245"\w* \w you|strong="H6310"\w* \w have|strong="H6887"\w* \w set|strong="H3245"\w* there,

\w what|strong="H4639"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w* mortals, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w think|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*, humans, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w visit|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*?

\w Yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w made|strong="H6485"\w* \w them|strong="H6485"\w* little \w less|strong="H3588"\w* \w than|strong="H3588"\w* divine, crowned \w them|strong="H6485"\w* \w with|strong="H1121"\w* glory \w and|strong="H1121"\w* majesty,
\w made|strong="H2637"\w* them lord \w of|strong="H3519"\w* \w the|strong="H3519"\w* works \w of|strong="H3519"\w* your hands, put \w all|strong="H2637"\w* things under their feet â€“

sheep \w and|strong="H3027"\w* oxen, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w*; \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wild beasts \w also|strong="H3027"\w*:

birds \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* air, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* fish \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sea, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* crosses \w the|strong="H3605"\w* paths \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ocean.

\nd Lord\nd* \w our|strong="H5674"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w*! How glorious \w in|strong="H3220"\w* \w all|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w* is \w your|strong="H5674"\w* name!
